name: The Stack Cat Jump
description:
Play "The Stack Cat Jump" to kill your free time.

It's Simple and Enjoyable. Tap on Screen to make Cat jump, Stack up the color switching boxes and make the best score in the world.

You should attention the speed of boxes and the Cat.

When Stack is higher, speed of stack will be more.

Let's play this Stacking Game and Make highest Stack. Make Screenshot of Best Score and Send it to you Friends.


Features:
- Best to Pass Free Time.
- More Colorful Boxes
- Attactive Graphics Effects and Sounds
- Challenging and Easy to Play
